column4: Hi there, i want to install captive-ntfs but when i execute the command /usr/share/lufs/prepmod there appears:
Failed to prepare lufs.ko module for your Linux kernel 2.6.10-5-386.
Detected Linux kernel sources "/lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/build" do not appear to  be valid.
you need the kernel source code
well that link needs to point to the kernel source tree
ls -ld /lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/build does that point to the kernel source?
hmm, no, i also have the linux-source installed
it need to point to the source tree. ln -fns /usr/src/LINUX_SOURCE /lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/build
now it works a bit more but there is already an error
Failed to prepare lufs.ko module for your Linux kernel 2.6.10-5-386.
Detected Linux kernel sources "/lib/modules/2.6.10-5-386/build" do not appear to be valid.
what kernel source package did you install?
sorry I don't know why you get that error
